website_summaries.verdict: This set comes with a knife for almost any dish you could cook, as well as a sharpener, scissors, and hardwood block.
pros: Durable, stainless steel blades are precision-stamped through the entire length of the knife
Includes 19 knives with different blade purposes, a sharpener, scissors, and hardwood knife block
cons: Manufacturer states knives are dishwasher safe, but recommends washing by hand
Handles are hollow and water can collect inside

customer_reviews.title: I'd like to return them but my return window is two ...
customer_reviews.text: They say rust resistant but they aren't . I'd like to return them but my return window is two weeks too late ..... Only have had them for 1 1/2 months....
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Rust Easily
customer_reviews.text: Warning!!! Don't put these in dishwasher they will rust as other buyers have experienced. I spoke to Gibson Manufacturing who makes these knives and the only thing they can do is make you pay to have it shipped to them for a replacement. I regret buying them. See photo. I have only had them for a month or two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy with caution!
customer_reviews.text: So initially I loved these knives! I saw reviews about people complaining about them being hollow, but gave them a shot anyways. Today while trimming some ribs, a part of the handle fell off on one of the knives! This particular knife I hardly use, I use the knife next to it more often! The knifes are sharp and look great, but the craftsmanship just isn’t there. I bought them because of the amount of knives that you get, I’ll have to look for another, better built brand.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Water clogged and rusty
customer_reviews.text: These knives are not one piece and the handle and blade are poorly connected. Water gets up inside the handle and randomly drips out while eating or holding upside down, even when left upside down to dry. After a few months of hand washing, the blades and handles have rusted and are therefore useless now.
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: Interesting knifes hopefully we'll enjoy them I'll update new news
customer_reviews.text: Just came in today I got this for my Mom and Dad for home use it's pretty heavy n the package but looks great the blades are pretty thin so I'm nervous about the hold up if it falls will it snap and if it will just but if anything happens I'll put up another review follow up but the knifes handles are great and light weight a few rough edges on the close up of the knife holder but it spins great
customer_reviews.author: Tim'esha M.

customer_reviews.title: Rust water contamination
customer_reviews.text: Not a great design at all. I put these in the sink to do the initial wash and they rusted almost immediately. I really don't like the thought of rust water coming out of my knife handles onto my food. I have never returned an item I've bought through Amazon, but these are going back for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: These are not stainless steel. Mine were rusted pulling them out of the box! Hand washed them, let them dry. When I started putting them away I discovered that the handles hold water, hence creating more rust. Also, the blade doesn’t go all the way through the handle, it looks like it does it the pictures but it’s actually a plastic spaced of some sort. Terrible design. Would not recommend for anyone 😡 Zero Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste R Combs

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!!! Gets rusty and water gets into the handles!
customer_reviews.text: When I got them I noticed the handles were very light and cheap feeling, But I thought it was a good price and that’s fine. It’s about a month now, when I wash them water gets into the handles and you could never fully dry it because water is always dripping out slowly over time. And now I see the knives are getting rusty!! I am very upset!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mosh

customer_reviews.title: Quick buy, rusts quickly
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these knives for less than 2 months and many of them have already started rusting. I understand when it comes to cutlery, you do get what you pay for. So, if you’re looking for a quick fix (moving, holidays, etc.) these are for you. If you’re looking for something long-lasting, DO NOT BUY. I doubt they’re real stainless steel and you will be disappointed. 3-stars because the knives do their job, but I wasn’t expecting them to rust so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: cannot be cleaned
customer_reviews.text: Oster's promotional video states that one should "wash and dry IMMEDIATELY" !. well, what they do not tel you is that the handles are hollow AND these black lines on handles are open channels!! . Dirt/food gets inside the handles via the channels and cannot be removed/washed!!! For the same reason, it cannot be dried as requested by the manufacturer! This set is garbage. looks beautiful, but I was not looking for a museum piece... Garbage!! do not buy it!
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: great set but.....
customer_reviews.text: This knife set is ok, I really like the black base. The knives are attractive and sharp. There is a great variety of knives and utensils. There is one major design flaw I have noticed. The knives hold water. Sometimes if you shake them after cleaning excess water comes out of the handle. This worries me especially with the possibility of bacteria growth in the handle. It's past the 30 day Amazon return policy so I am keeping these but not for to long.... if only the knives were solid there would be no issue with water.
customer_reviews.author: Gina C

customer_reviews.title: Knife Set Delimma
customer_reviews.text: I noticed how easy these start to rust. I haven't had them very long and I need to polish 2 of them already. :( they have to be 100% dry before putting them away. They were not that sharp; I'm not sure if this is the way they come and you have to sharpen them or they should be pretty sharp at purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vivi Banks

customer_reviews.title: Dont purchase
customer_reviews.text: The set is beautiful but dont let the looks fool you. They rust super fast even with proper care and when I was chopping onion you could feel the knife wobbling they are not sturdy also another thing was that where the knife and handle meet water would get stuck in between and were very dull.. Dont buy it! My older set from Walmart was way better than this and super sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Rusty after a Week
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they seemed like a good deal. When they arrived, I was quite pleased. The weight is not bad, they feel sturdy, and cut pretty well as they came. One week and a half after, rist is starting to take over... so, if they didn't get rusty so fast, they would have been good.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: not bad not bad
customer_reviews.text: I was excited that this came in way sooner than expected. When I unboxed the set the knifes came covered properly and I didnt cut myself! the knives themselves want not the best of textures, but after a quick easy wash they are a bit better (very sharp out of the box they nearly cut my sponge in half). I love the scissors that come with the set! (my new Kim chi scissors) they are sturdy and so far havent rusted since I washed them!
customer_reviews.author: Tori Larose

customer_reviews.title: Well....
customer_reviews.text: They look great but take serious consideration in purchasing these after reading a few reviews. I read a few and decided that I would go for it anyway. pros: Look great in my kitchen Plenty of knives one for anything you could need. Dishwasher safe Super sharp. Cons: Hollow handles that trap water (do not let them sit in dirty water even for a second) Rust VERY quickly like after first wash quickly. All in all i am slightly disappointed in Oster for selling such a crappy product. This set was a decent price and will work until I can afford a $200 set that will hold up for life.
customer_reviews.author: Amiee G

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter for Christmas. It came well packaged and delivery was ahead of schedule. She said she loves her new knife set. All her knives are sharp and recommended I buy mussels the same set.
customer_reviews.author: bc4933

customer_reviews.title: Water stains bad, quality good
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp knives and definitely stand out great on the counter. I love how professional they look but I do hate the water stains they get after washing them. You have to hand dry them every time they get wet if not they end get these horrible water spots. But definitely a good value and a great addition to any kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Missing Knife, 3 legged block
customer_reviews.text: Was excited about this purchase until I unboxed. Missing was a steak knife and the block only had 3 rubber legs so it leans unless I prop something underneath. I saw in a previous review about the short on knives but the box comes taped!?!? Someone can't count or needs to take their time. How do I go about getting my knife and leg or new block?????
customer_reviews.author: Choke

customer_reviews.title: broken scissors too soon, can't immerse in water
customer_reviews.text: Not the best set out there but they cut well. Not safe to immerse in water when eashing because water will get stuck in the handle. Hasn't rusted yet like other reviews. I love the cleaver and the turning block. I got kinda upset that the scissors handle broke. They cut so good but I had to replace them because of the handle breaking. These will hold me over til I get the miracle blade set. thats the set I really want
customer_reviews.author: Aliyah A. Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this knife set for only 2 months and they’re already starting to rust. I spent $50 for knives that I thought were going to be nice and last awhile and I was poorly mistaken. It specifically says in the description that “the stainless steel makes the knives resistant to rust” that’s clearly not true and the fact that they rusted after only two months is ridiculous. I will never buy from this brand again and I suggest you don’t either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The set is great
customer_reviews.text: I still cant believe everything that is included in the set for that price. the set is nice to look at and very well made. all the knives are sharp, the scissors cut well. Overall an excellent product
customer_reviews.author: neli

customer_reviews.title: Knife set
customer_reviews.text: This is a wedding gift but when I went to take it out of the Amazon box, the Oster box completely fell apart. I now have to use a different box for it.🙁
customer_reviews.author: Sharoncoles

customer_reviews.title: Broken handle right out of box.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty to look at. I like the swivel stand. What I don't like is that I literally JUST opened the box and one of the big knives has a handle that already broken. I'm thinking if its broken eight out the box and I haven't even used it yet, how long is it gonna last?
customer_reviews.author: ebony

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what they say they are. And this is a very nice set. We love them and a great value as well.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Heatley

customer_reviews.title: Craftsmanship and price
customer_reviews.text: Very durable ! Well made! Great look! After hand washing I noticed water coming out of the bottom of the knives!! Why would that happen??
customer_reviews.author: Laureen M

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These were great at first, but turned out to be JUNK. Waste of $50. Two of the knifes have separated from the handles, they get rust spots, they went dull in no time. And the handle on the scissors broke. Would never recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold cut and clean with great price.
customer_reviews.text: Used them for the first time to prepare dinner last night. Where have these knives been all my life. The set includes everything and the price was even better.
customer_reviews.author: Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great set of knives. Just bought a new home, and wanted to get a good set of knifes and rid myself of the multiple non matching knifes that I've managed to collect over the years, plus replacing everything with stainless steel. This set is so complete, and the caddy saves me drawer space.
customer_reviews.author: Swtbrnskn

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I received this set a few days ago and I love it, it looks like it’s more expensive than the price and the knives are sturdy and sharp.
customer_reviews.author: S. Giles

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Is really the only word to use. These knifes cut like butter. Great invented especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tenesha West

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product with all the types of knives for a kitchen. Only doubt, do we need these varieties of knives in our kitchen, but I like this product for the finish and the aesthetics in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jake S.

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after first wash
customer_reviews.text: Rusted and filled with water the first time it went through the dishwasher Then we cleaned them by hand and it's still rusting I'm very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Northcoastbarbie

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife set
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy knife set. Not cheap at all. Good quality. Cuts very well. Highly recommend alot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Llama

customer_reviews.title: Sharp knives, and fancy look.
customer_reviews.text: It came just like pictures, and it looks very nice in our kitchen. Matched up great with all our stainless steel kitchen equipment. My only problem was how easy the paint chips when putting the knives back. It started chipping about 3 months after I bought it. I was hoping that due to the name brand it would hold up longer than that, but overall I'm happy with it. Mite just have to repaint it later.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy thornton

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: After a little over a month with these knives, they have started rusting. They also went dull very quickly. They look great out of the box and the knife block rotates, but those are the only upsides to these knives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: D
customer_reviews.text: These are hand wash only. They are not dishwasher safe. They will rust. Other than that, very nice & very sharp. Husband really likes them. A Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L Herron

customer_reviews.title: Great style, low quality
customer_reviews.text: Stylish set but it's bulkier than it looks. Knives don't have a good weigh and feel kind if cheap in your hand. I've been hand-washing most of the pieces but the steak knives that when through the dishwasher rusted. About half the knives had rust on then after 4 mos. if prefer one high quality everyday knife.
customer_reviews.author: Katie M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my son who's off to college in the fall. I loved how this set came with so much and it was black not on a butcher block like most. I think that's more bascultion overall in black. I'm sure it'll be enjoyed for his college journey and then some.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Garbage handle broke
customer_reviews.text: Money down the drain pisses me off that companies sell such JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: TrumpSucks

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality!
customer_reviews.text: Awful product! The knives and scissors lost their sharpness after about a week of use. Several of the knives handles aren't secured very well which makes them fill up with water in the dishwasher. When I remove them from the basket all the water runs out of them. Bad quality!
customer_reviews.author: hygienist24

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. They look great, nice and sharp,, and are well built.
customer_reviews.author: Just_A_Little_Book_Crazy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This knife set looks good perfect size knifes are sharp has everything you need in a knife set price not that bad also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not best quality but gets the work done
customer_reviews.text: The block came broken and the box wasn't so I guess that's the quality of the knives that I should expect. Not sure if they will send me a new block as they should but there's nowhere yo request it.. The set looks good for the price, it does feel and look like it won't last a year and also the material doesn't look dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: LDelancer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this block 1 month ago. Knives have already started to rust. Buyer beware. Horrible purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in my kitchen, I also got my mom some and my sister some
customer_reviews.author: Tanji

customer_reviews.title: They rust
customer_reviews.text: I've had this knife set for a month and they are rusted. I hand wash and dry them. Not happy with this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: michelle Drye

customer_reviews.title: Great set of knives for a decent price!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and was pleasantly surprised at how well they cut and how nice they look for the reasonable price!!
customer_reviews.author: Laci DeVarney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this set for my sister, she loves it and always talk about it.
customer_reviews.author: Angelic Glam

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect kitchen utensil
customer_reviews.text: I just took it out the box. I Love it, it's so sheek used it and it slices so nicely
customer_reviews.author: Francine E.

customer_reviews.title: Knife set
customer_reviews.text: I only want stuff I can put in dishwasher. Had my old set for 40 years and they still looked good just old. Got these last fall and they are rusting in dishwasher already.
customer_reviews.author: Linda apple

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Have had just over a month and is showing rust spots already. Scissors broke cutting a piece of paper. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but missing a knife
customer_reviews.text: I love this set and it perfect in my kitchen. I was unable to give it 5 stars because it came with one of the steak knives missing. Other than that it’s great and I’ve been using the knives everyday when making meals.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Fashionista

customer_reviews.title: These are a steal!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a divorced bachelor, and am rebuilding my home needs. This knife set is a STEAL at $39, and they are sharp and easy to use. No need to spend $200 on a big name set. Has a sharpening tool as well. Dishwasher safe too. They have a clean, crisp monochrome look. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Zaleski

customer_reviews.title: Slick and modern for our new kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We love this knife set, it is modern, simple, and dishwasher safe. 4 stars because the water sometimes sits on the handle after washing and drips out after you think it’s dry. Otherwise they work nicely!
customer_reviews.author: desirae waltman

customer_reviews.title: Rust from the first wash
customer_reviews.text: accumulates a lot of rust. the handlers are very light.
customer_reviews.author: Andy A.

customer_reviews.title: NOT STAINLESS STEEL
customer_reviews.text: These products are falsely advertised and unfortunately passed the date that I can return them. I bought these when in the process of buying a new house and was so excited to use them. I've only had them out of the package for 3 weeks now, and they rust TERRIBLY! I would not recommend this knife set.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Brown

customer_reviews.title: Stainless until they rust
customer_reviews.text: These are not mirror polished and somehow the rust that has formed on my knives is defying the 'stainless' part of the description. I would not buy these again, nor would I recommend them. Buyer beware, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Same Tangled Name

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, ive been duped
customer_reviews.text: I have not had this product 1 month and the knives are rusting. Ive never put them in the dishwasher, only handwashed as directed. Water gets trapped inside of the handles, even drip dry causes rusting
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: this looks like a fancier knife set than what you're paying for
customer_reviews.text: this looks like a fancier knife set than what you're paying for. but the knives are good quality. the handles are more plastic than stainless steel or alumninum. but i didn't want to spend a lot of money so these are perfect for our house.
customer_reviews.author: nickersonmn

customer_reviews.title: But thses !
customer_reviews.text: I've had these knives for over a year and a half now. Ni rusting. Still sharp. Awesome set!
customer_reviews.author: Brian smith

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I have had these knives less than a year and almost all of them have rusted. None of my other silverware is rusty so I’m pretty sure the problem isn’t with me! Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Be careful very sharp
customer_reviews.text: These knives are great. They are very sharp and the whole set is that way!! Definitely a great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P.

customer_reviews.title: Good knives for a beginners set
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic knives, especially for a first set for a single college student. They do hold water in the handles so its best to clean them immediately after to avoid having to submerge them in water for too long to clean them properly because food dried on to it. They have a nice clean look, and I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: gets rusty - wish I could have returned
customer_reviews.text: These knives rust way to easily. Not worth the money. Every time they get washed, they get rust spots. Horrible purchase, wish I was able to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Danni1978

customer_reviews.title: Knives.
customer_reviews.text: They're sharp, comfortable to use, and feel sturdy enough. They look a lot more solid than they are, though. They are light, and for some reason I got the impression they would be heavy and solid when I ordered them. Other than that, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Bought these mid August for my new home and they are rusting. I hand wash my dishes and did not have them soaking for very long and they started rusting and leaking the rust from within. Definitely do not recommend! I have not had these for 2 months. TERRIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: Celia Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: These are a 10....
customer_reviews.text: This set handles all the jobs in the kitchen. I love the cleaver for hams or items like sausage. With a few strokes across a fine sharpener before use and you have a very nice edge. When you go to the table you have some great steak knives too. Very sturdy set, and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: These are so great! I’ve had them forever now and they never rusted or kept water. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Roe

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment and waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: The knifes are decent for cutting and chopping but I will not be buying this brand ever again. 2 days after using the knives got rust spots on the blades (not the handle) and the handle stores water. I was very disappointed that I couldn't get the rust stains off. Definitely not stainless steel as advertised. I do not recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: It’s cool
customer_reviews.text: Nice set the only thing that’s wrong is it came cracked and also the box was broken but everything was there
customer_reviews.author: TaLisa

customer_reviews.title: looks good o picture but an empty handle causes unballance knives
customer_reviews.text: looks good o picture but an empty handle causes unballance knives. It feels cheap on hands, i would not put on table if receiving people. I did use them for a few days and was deceived how quick cutting edge whent off. i would not recommand eventhough price is very low..I did not took time and money to return but definetely not recommanding this item. feels too cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Normand Hache

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Ending up finding a smaller cheaper one so returned this one
customer_reviews.author: KHallford

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife set.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price, would buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Apollyon

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: Not dishwasher safe, rust on knives after two wash cycles
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality handles; you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The stainless steel looks great; knives are sharp! The handles are hollow and slightly wobbly when using them; not very tightly clamped together and will drip water when you hand wash them allowing future chances of rust
customer_reviews.author: Christy Ensign

customer_reviews.title: ... in the handles causing the blades to rust very easily. I thought that stainless steel was supposed to ...
customer_reviews.text: The knives appear to hold water in the handles causing the blades to rust very easily. I thought that stainless steel was supposed to be resistant to rust. I am disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: inkblot

customer_reviews.title: Think twice
customer_reviews.text: looks great but I'm seeing the flaws that other reviews that were left will probably hold true such as the handle it's got a cheap rubber gasket when it should have a silicone seal to keep water out and realistically all knives go dull that's why the give u a sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: amazon loves me

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Its a good knife set, they are sharp and look nice. My only complaint would be they are super light do feel slightly cheap to me, given for the price they are a good buy. Update: so I'm just now getting around to really using them. When washed water sits in the handles. When you hold them down water pours out. So I can't imagine sitting water in the handles could be a good thing
customer_reviews.author: Plonka89

customer_reviews.title: Incrediable
customer_reviews.text: I was under the assumption that this would arrive tomorrow Thursday but came a day ahead of time. Exactly what was listed and just what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great knives foe the price. The block also is a lazy Susan type so it can riste and spin.
customer_reviews.author: Jerae David

customer_reviews.title: Looks great...
customer_reviews.text: Some of the slots for the knives are slightly miss-cut so the knives don't fit *exactly* right but it's really not very noticeable. You absolutely *must* buy a sharpener to go with these knives as they come factory sharpened, which really isn't very sharp at all. Spend the extra $5 on a sharpener and enjoy razor thin slices of whatever you're cutting.
customer_reviews.author: mhallacy

customer_reviews.title: Not wusthof but will do
customer_reviews.text: This cutting set is the idea cutting set you want to get it is not as cheap as Faber ware and will last much longer. Also this material is true stainless steel either 304 or 316. I recommend this set to match any modern kitchen set up and for the price is practical. This set also has every basic cutting tool you need to cut.
customer_reviews.author: NotFromAJedi

customer_reviews.title: Not what I want for the price
customer_reviews.text: These knives are very poor quality, the listing says nothing of the knife handles filling with water if rinsed, upon reading the enclosed paperwork that came with the knives it says to "Carefully wipe clean with sudsy cloth and rinse after each use. Always wipe dry immediately. Do not clean in a dishwasher or allow to soak." We rinsed them off and handles took in water......Very unsanitary design.........
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks good except block was cracked
customer_reviews.text: Knife set looks good but when it arrived the block was cracked. I'm pretty sure someone mentioned that in a comment I read before buying them lol.. Too much of a hassle to return/repurchase so I guess it's fine but I literally can't stop looking at it lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete shipment
customer_reviews.text: There are no knives, kitchen sizzors,nor knife sharpener. It's supposed to be a "14 piece block set". I only received the block and now have to go through returning it and waiting for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The knives are wonderful! Lightweight and durable! They cut very nicely as well!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These were the worse knives I ever bought. They don't cut ever after you sharpen them. The only thing I liked was the swivel knife block.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G

customer_reviews.title: Will recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: It came exactly how it looks. I can tell it is heavy duty. Absolute great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes T.

customer_reviews.title: SO Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I received this knife set on February 28, 2020 and they have rusted! It is April 16, 2020!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Pattillo

customer_reviews.title: Won’t be disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Knife Block
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous set and worth the money I spent on it. The knife holder spins and I am very happy with this feature. Knives are sharp and look more expensive than some out in the market for a higher price.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing slice, for a cheap buck
customer_reviews.text: I love them, I'm surprised that even when my hands are wet, slippery the knife never slips from my grip. Over the moon satisfied with the product and it was at a grate buy. Thanks Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Makes the Cut
customer_reviews.text: Knives are sharp and of decent quality for the price. Handles are plastic and feel cheap like they may break easily. Butcher block has a nice swivel on the base, but again, is rather cheaply made.

customer_reviews.title: it was a nice buy however after only a few months I've started ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it was a nice buy however after only a few months I've started to notice rust developing from a few dishwasher runs.

product_meta.title: Oster Baldwyn High-Carbon Stainless Steel Cutlery Knife Block Set, 22-Piece, Brushed Satin
product_meta.description: Size:22-Piece| Color:Brushed SatinLooking to add some style and precision to your kitchen? The Oster evansville cutlery set is the perfect answer. The evansville cutlery set is made with precision stamped steel that is extremely durable. The stainless steel blades are resistant to rust and staining, ensuring that your cutlery will remain in the top shape for years to come. This durable set of blades is made to last and the wooden storage block will only make these blades last longer by protecting them from being scratched and dulled in a traditional knife drawer.
feature_bullets: 22-Piece Set Includes: (8) 4.5" Steak Knives and (1) Each: 6.5" Santoku | 8" Chef, Carving and Bread | 6" Cleaver, Chef, Utility and Boning | 7" Utility Fork | 5" Utility | 3.5" Pairing | 3" Bird's Beak Pairing | Scissors | Sharpening Steel | 360* Swivel Block
Precision Stamped High-Carbon Stainless Steel Construction for Durability and Quality
Superior Fine Edges for Smooth Cutting and Slicing
Beautiful Hardwood swivel block rotates 360 degrees
Hand wash to keep knives sharp
